channel.title: spacemacs on Boyang Yan's Tech Blog
channel.description: Recent content in spacemacs on Boyang Yan's Tech Blog

item.title: Getting Started with Spacemacs/Emacs
item.author: yanboyang713@gmail.com (Boyang Yan)
item.description: Installation Run Emacs in Docker https://github.com/Silex/docker-emacs Usage Console 1 docker run -it --rm silex/emacs GUI 1 2 xhost +local:root # WARN: this comes with security issues docker run -it --rm -e DISPLAY -v /tmp/.X11-unix:/tmp/.X11-unix silex/emacs Arch Linux (Manjaro) 1 yay -S emacs 1 yay -S adobe-source-code-pro-fonts clone spacemacs repo and use develop branch 1 git clone https://github.com/syl20bnr/spacemacs.git ~/.

item.title: Getting started with UML (Unified Modeling Language)
item.author: yanboyang713@gmail.com (Boyang Yan)
item.description: Introduction This post document will brief introduct UML at the begining. After, will talk how using PlantUML for drawing UML diagrams. At the end, how does PlantUML integrate with Markdown and Emacs(Spacemacs). UML Basics PlantUML Basics Reasons for using PlantUML Markdown Emacs (Spacemacs) Summary
